Reflecting on some RE I've done recently I'm curious about how differently ASLR works across Windows and Linux :-

Is it enough to compile shared libraries on Linux with the fPIC flag so that they can take advantage of the ASLR system wide setting?
On Windows are there any compile time settings other than ASCOMPAT that I should enable in order to take advantage of ASLR?
Are there any ways in which the ASLR implementation is better in one platform that the other?
